s:workflowdescription.author: Alan R Williams
s:workflowdescription.title: Get web page from URL - url and base

s:scufl.s:workflowdescription: Fetches a web page from http://www.mygrid.org.uk/tools with the base parameter as "http://www.mygrid.org.uk" and the url as "/tools". Note that when viewed, the HTML may not be rendered correctly. However, the HTML may be viewed by rendering the result as plain text.
